\begin{document}

\title{Manual of {\tt APFEL++}}

\author{Valerio Bertone$^{a,b}$}

\institution{$^{a}$PH Department, TH Unit, CERN, CH-1211 Geneva 23,
  Switzerland\\$^{b}$University of Oxford, 1 Keble Road, OX1 3NP Oxford, UK}
\maketitle

\begin{abstract} In this document I describe the {\tt APFEL++} code, a
  rewriting in {\tt c++} of the {\tt Fortran} evolution and DIS code
  {\tt APFEL}. 
\end{abstract}
\tableofcontents{}

\newpage

\section{Why {\tt c++}?}

{\tt APFEL} was originally conceived in 2012 in the framework of the
NNPDF collaboration as a benchmark code to check the QED evolution of
the NNPDF2.3QED sets~\cite{Ball:2013hta}. The idea of making it public
came immediately after.



\newpage
